SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers

Class ProfileViewController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.ProfileViewController
public class ProfileViewController extends Object
Controller class for managing the profile view in the application. It handles displaying user preferences, watch history, and statistical data such as pie charts. The class also facilitates saving and updating user preferences.
Author:
Sviat, GH Copilot, Markus, Kian
